sentences.sentence: Coexistence necessitates the total noninterference by any power in the internal affairs of another.
sentences.translation: 共处必需是任何国家都决不干涉别国的内部事务。

sentences.sentence: We developed an example integration scenario that could be enabled by any of the myriad of coexistence mechanisms.
sentences.translation: 我们开发了一个示例集成场景，该场景可以由无数的共存机制所支持。

sentences.sentence: He also believed in coexistence with the West.
